article.headline: Vermont 80, MD Baltimore Co 70
article.story: CATONSVILLE, Md. (AP) -- Taylor Coppenrath had 17 points and 12 rebounds and reserve Josh Duell added 16 points, helping Vermont beat Maryland-Baltimore County 80-70 Wednesday night for its 13th straight win. T.J. Sorrentine scored 14 points and Germain Mopa Njila 13 for the Catamounts (16-3, 11-0 America East), who hit 11-of-26 3-point attempts. Vermont has won eight consecutive road games. Rob Gogerty led UMBC (9-11, 4-7 America East) with season-highs of 19 points and nine assists. John Zito scored 16 for the Retrievers, who have dropped two straight games and had a three-game home winning streak snapped. Duell hit three of the Catamounts' six 3-pointers in the first half and Vermont led by as many as 19 en route to a 40-28 halftime edge. Vermont used runs of 6-0 and 9-0 to build a 25-9 lead with 8:38 left in the first half. Consecutive 3-pointers by Duell pushed the lead to 33-16 before Michael Knight came off the bench to spark a Retriever rally. Knight hit two 3s as UMBC closed the half on an 11-5 run. The Retrievers got within seven points three times early in the second half -- the final time on Rashad Bilal's 3 from the left side with 16:42 left -- before the Catamounts put the game away with a 9-2 run. Mopa Njila scored the first six points on a jumper, a tip-in and a layup and Ryan Schneider's 3-pointer provided a 57-42 lead.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
